details.title: Take your music everywhere with Deezer
details.text:
• Listen on all your devices.
  • Download music & listen offline.
  • Better sound quality.
  • No ads.

First 6 months free thereafter R59.99 monthly recurring.

You can cancel your subscription at any time.The first 6 months free is only available once!

checkbox.label: I accept terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: To continue, you must agree to the terms & conditions.

accordion.label: Info on Deezer
accordion.text:
Premium

  • You get unlimited music from Deezer for the duration of your term. Red plans get first 6 months FREE thereafter it will move to a paid subscription. All other plans get first month FREE.
  • If you already have a Deezer account, we can help you to upgrade or transfer it.

Internet charges

  • You will pay standard data rates to use the service when roaming or when you have exceeded your data allowance.

Stopping the offer

  • For Red plans the subscription for 6 months is part of your tariff plan and will move to a paid for subscription after the first 6 months. You may cancel at anytime after the 6 months. All other plans can be canceled at anytime.
  • Please contact Vodacom on 082 111 if you have any questions.

Stopping the offer

  • Deezer is supported by a wide range of mobile and home entertainment devices, including Android, Windows, Apple iOS, web and many more. Please click here to see if your device is support!
